藥品: Potassium Chloride ER 口服 10mEq/750mg/tab (Const-K ER)
藥理分類: [6610] Replenishers and Regulators of Water and Electrolytes
廠牌: Impax Laboratories (Taiwan), Inc. for Bora Pharmaceutical(保瑞藥業委託益邦製藥)
成人劑量:
Prevention of hypokalemia: 20 to 40 mEq/day in 1 to 2 divided doses.
Treatment of hypokalemia:
Mild to moderate: 40 to 100 mEq daily in divided doses
Severe hypokalemia: 40 mEq po tid to qid
小孩劑量: Safety and effectiveness of potassium chloride extended-release tablets in children have not been established.
副作用: 脹氣、腹痛、腹瀉、嘔吐、噁心
用藥指導: 整顆吞服。與食物併服可減緩腸胃不適副作用。若解黑便請盡快就醫。藥粒可能隨糞便完整排出是正常現象。
注意事項: 單次口服投與K+ > 40 mEq通常會造成無法耐受的腸胃不適，一般建議單次劑量不要超過25 mEq/dose以減輕腸胃道副作用。
